juzs.text: Fast approaching est reckoning popol ili est oblivious averse
When proof ven al them el their Lord est neo ili auxskult al gxi heedlessly
Their mens est heedless. transgressors confer secretly Est li ne just human est vi? Vi akcept magic prezent vi
Li dir My Lord kon cxiu opini heaven ter. Li est Hearer Omniscient
Ili ecx dir Hallucinations Li far gxi Li est poet! Let him montr us mirakl like those de previous messengers
Ni neniam annihilated kred community en des preter. Est these popol believers
Ni ne send vi hom ni inspir. Pet those kon scripture vi ne kon
Ni ne don them korp mangx nor est ili immortal
Ni fulfilled our promes them; ni sav them together whomever ni willed annihilated transgressors
Ni send vi scripture containing your message Vi ne kompren
Many community ni terminated their transgression ni substituted ali popol their met
When our requital ven pas ili started kur
Ne kur ven your luks your mansions vi ten accountable
Ili dir Ve al us. Ni est really wicked
This ad est their proclamation gxis ni completely visx them out
Ni ne kre heavens ter cxio them just amusement
Ni bezon amusement ni iniciat gxi any da this est ki ni wanted do
Instead est our plan support truth falsehood en ord defeat gxi! Ve al vi por utterances vi utter
Him aparten everyone heavens ter those je Him est neniam tro arrogant worship Him nor do ili ever waver
Ili glor nokt tag sen ever lac
Ili trov di ter kre
Se tie est them (heavens ter) ali di DI tie est chaos. Glory est DI; Lord absolut auxtoritat Li est alt their pretend
Li est neniam est pet pri anything Li while all others questioned
Ili trov ali di Him? Dir Montr me your proof This est message my generaci consummating all previous messages Ja plej de them ne recognize truth; this est ili est tial hostile
Ni ne send any messenger vi inspiration Tie ne est di escept Me vi worship Me sol
sed ili dir plej Gracious begotten fil! Glory est Him. All (messengers) est (His) honor servants
Ili neniam parol sur their own ili strictly sekv His ordon
Li kon their future their preter. Ili ne intercede escept por those jam akcept Him kaj ili worried their own kol
any da them pretend est di Him ni requite him Infer; ni tiel requite des wicked
unbelievers ne realize ke heaven ter uz est 1 solid mes ke ni eksplod existence? El akv ni far all viv ajx! Ili kred
Ni ej ter stabilizers lest gxi tumbles them ni ej rekt roads therein ke ili direkt
Ni rendered cxiel gard plafon. sed ili est totally oblivious al all portents therein
Kaj Li est Unu kre nokt tag sun lun; each floating en its own orbit
Ni neniam dekret immortality anyone antaux vi; vi mort est ili immortal
Cxiu ul gust death post ni put vi test tra adversity prosperity tiam al us vi ultimately return
When those disbelieve vid vi, ili ridicule vi Est this unu challenges your di Meanwhile ili ceter totally heedless de message el plej Gracious
human est est impatient natur. Mi inevitably montr vi My sign; ne est such hurry
Ili challenge Kie ke (retribution vi est est truthful)
Nur those disbelieve envision when ili pen ward fajr - off their vizagx their dors! Ne 1 help them tiam
Ja gxi ven them suddenly ili utterly stunned Ili can nek evit gxi nor can ili ricev any respite
Messengers vi ridiculed consequently those ridiculed them incurred retribution por their ridiculing
Dir Who protekt vi el plej Gracious nokt tag? Ja ili est totally oblivious al message their Lord
Ili di Do hav protekt them el us? Ili ne ecx help. Nor can ili akompan unu another when ili summoned vizagx us
Ni hav proviz por these popol their ancestors up old agx! Ili ne seg cxiu tag ter brings them closer end Ili reverse this process
dir mi avert vi en accordance kun divine inspiration. surd ne auxd vok when ili avert
When sample your Lord's retribution aflikt them ili readily dir Ni est ja wicked
Ni establ skal de justice Tag Resurrection. Ne anim sufer malplej injustice. Eben ekvivalent de mustard seed vol est accounted por! Ni est plej efficient reckoners
Ni don Moses Aaron Statut Libr beacon reminder por des righteous
Unu reverence their Lord eben when sol en their privacy ili worry Hor
This tro est ben reminder ke ni send down Vi denying gxi
Antaux ke, ni granted Abraham his guidance kompren ni est fully aware da him
Li dir al his patr his popol Ki est these statu al which vi devoting
Ili dir Ni trov our parents worshipping them
Li dir Ja vi your parents ir totally astray
Ili dir vi telling us truth vi lud
Li dir Your nur Lord est Lord de heavens ter kre them. This est testimony al which mi bor witness
Mi jxur DI mi hav plan deal kun your statu vi las
Li romp them into pec escept por grand unu ili refer gxi
Ili dir Whoever did this our di est really transgressor
Ili dir Ni auxd youth minac them; li est vok Abraham
Ili dir Bring him okul all popol ili bor witness
Ili dir vi do this our di O Abraham
Li dir est grand unu did gxi. Ir pet them se ili parol
Ili sorb aback dir al Ja vi est des unu transgressing
Ili reverted their old ide Vi kon plen put ke these ne parol
Li dir vi tiam worship DI Do ki ne posed potenc benefit vi harm vi
Vi incurred fi worshipping idols DI! Vi ne kompren
Ili dir Brul him support your di this est ki vi decid do
Ni dir O fajr est cool sekur por Abraham
Tiel ili schemed him ni far them losers
Ni sav him ni sav Lot land ni ben all popol
Ni granted him Isaac Jacob gift ni far them ambaux righteous
Ni far them imams direkt en accordance kun our commandments ni instru them kiel work righteousness kiel observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) obligatory charity (Zakat)! Al us ili devoted worshipers
As por Lot ni granted him wisdom knowledge ni sav him el community ke practiced abomen; ili est wicked evil popol
Ni admitted him our mercy li est righteous
antaux ke, Noah vok ni respond him. Ni sav him his famili el great disaster
Ni supported him popol rejected our revelations. Ili est evil popol ni dron them all
David Solomon when ili once regul regard someone's crop ke detru another's sxaf ni witnessed their judgment
Ni granted Solomon gxust kompren ni dot ambaux them kun wisdom knowledge. Ni committed mont dejxor David glor (Di) tro bird! This est ki ni did
Ni instru him skill far sxild protekt vi en milit! Est vi tiam thankful
Solomon ni committed vent gusting blov his disposal. Li direct gxi as li wished whatever land li chose ni ben such land him. Ni est fully aware da all ajx
(De diabl tie est those dive him rikolt mar) do whatever li komand them do Ni committed them en his service
Job implored his Lord Adversity befallen me de all merciful unu Vi est plej Merciful
Ni respond him relieved his adversity restored his famili por him ecx twice as mult. Ke est mercy us reminder worshipers
Ankaux Ismail Idris Zal-Kifl; all est steadfast pacient
Ni admitted them our mercy ili est righteous
Zan-Noon (Jonah 1 kun ‘N' en his nom) abandoned his misi en protest opini ni ne control him! Li ended imploring darkness grand fisx belly Tie ne est di Vi. Vi glor. Mi committed gross pek
Ni respond him sav him el kriz; ni tiel sav believers
Zachariah implored his Lord My Lord do ne keep me heir Vi est bon inheritor
Ni respond him granted him John; ni fiks his wife him! Ili uz hasten work righteousness implored us situaci de joy ankaux as tim! Al us ili est reverent
As por 1 who argument her virginity ni blov her our spirit tiel ni far her her fil portent des whole mond
Your congregation est 1 congregation mi sol est your Lord vi worship Me sol
Ili divid disput religi. All da them ven us judgment
As por those work righteousness while kred their work ne ir waste ni recording gxi
Gxi forbidden any community ni annihilated return
Ne Gog Magog reappear testament ili tiam return - Ili ven cxiu direction
Est when inevitable prophecy ven pas disbelievers stare en horror Ve al us ni est oblivious! Ja ni est wicked
Vi idols vi worship besides DI testament est fuel Infer; this est your inevitable destiny
those est di ili ne ended Infer. All its inhabitants abide gxi forever
Ili sigh gxem therein ili ne hav access any news
As por those ind our magnificent rekompenc ili protekt el gxi
Ili ne auxd its sibl Ili gxu abode kie ili get cxio ili dezir forever
great horror ne worry them angxel ricev them joyfully This est your tag promes vi
Ke tag ni fald heaven fald libr. Just as ni iniciat 1 creation ni ripet gxi. This est our promes; ni certainly port gxi
Ni dekret Psalm tro as ali scriptures ti ter hered My righteous worshipers
This est proclamation popol est worshipers
Ni send vi mercy us des whole mond
Proklam mi don divine inspiration your di est 1 di! Vi tiam submit
Ili turn tiam dir mi avert vi suficx mi ne hav ide kiel baldaux late (retribution) ven vi
Li est fully aware da your publik utterances Li est fully aware da cxio vi conceal
all mi kon this mond est test vi temporary enjoyment
Dir My Lord Your judgment est absolut justice Our Lord est plej Gracious; nur His help streb en des vizagx de your pretend
O popol vi reverence vi Lord quaking de Hor est io horrendous
Tag vi witness gxi eben nursing mother vol discard her infant graved woman abort her fetus. Vi seg popol staggering as ili ebri eben ili ne ebri. This est di retribution est tial awesome
Among des popol, tie est those argue DI knowledge sekv cxiu rebellious diabl
Gxi dekret anyone allies him li mislead him direkt him agondi Infer

(O popol se vi hav any dub resurrection memor ke) ni kre vi polv subsequently tiny gut turn into pend (embryo) tiam gxi igx fetus don life deemed lifeless! Ni tiel clarify ajx vi. Ni sald wombs whatever ni testament por predetermined period! Ni tiam bring vi out infants tiam vi reach maturity. While kelk da vi mort jun others viv al mav agx nur al trov out ke neni knowledge ating nepr lim! Ankaux vi rigard land est dead tiam as baldaux as ni dusx gxi akv gxi vibr life kresk all kinds da bel plant
This pruv ti DI est Truth ke Li revives dead ke Li est Omnipotent
Kaj ke Hor ven ne dub gxi kaj ti DI resurrects those est graves
Among des popol tie est unu who argues DI knowledge guidance enlightening scripture
Arrogantly li strives divert popol path DI. Li tiel incurs humiliation en this life ni commit him Tag Resurrection agondi de brul
This est ki your man send ahead vi. DI est NENIAM unjust towards POPOL
Among des popol tie est unu worships DI conditionally. Ajx ir his voj li est kontent. Kelk adversity befalls him li far about-face Tiel li perd ambaux this life Hereafter Such est efektiv loss
Li idolizes DI ki ne posed potenc harm him benefit him; such est efektiv straying
Li idolizes ki est plur apt harm him than benefit him! Ki miserable lord Ki miserable companion
DI admits those kred PLUMB righteous life into GXARDEN FLU streams Cxio est en accordance kun di testament
anyone opini ti DI ne support him en this life Hereafter let him torn completely (his creator heaven sever (his dependence sur anyone aux Li tiam seg this plan eliminates anything ke gxen him)
Ni tiel revealed klar revelations herein tiam DI direkt whoever vol direkt
Those kred those est Jewish konvert Christians Zoroastrians idol worshipers DI est Unu jugx them Tag Resurrection. DI witnesses all AJX

Vi ne realize ti DI prostrates everyone heavens ter sun lun stel mont arb best many popol? Many others among des popol committed doom Whomever DI fi neniom honor him. Cxio est en accordance kun di testament
Here est 2 parti feuding regard their Lord As por those disbelieve ili hav vest de fajr tajlor por them! Hellish liquid vol versx their kap
Gxi kauxz their insides fand tro their hauxt
Ili confined glad pot
Whenever ili pen exit such mizer ili forced dors en Gust agondi de brul
DI testament admit those kred PLUMB righteous life into GXARDEN FLU streams Ili ornam therein bracelets or perl their garments therein est silk
Ili direkt bon vort; ili direkt path de plej Lauxd
Surely those disbelieve repulse others path DI el Sankt Masjid ni designated all popol! - est ili indigxen visitors! - Streb pollute gxi corrupt gxi ni aflikt them painful retribution
Ni appointed Abraham establ Shrine Vi ne idolize any ali di Me purify My shrine those vizit gxi those viv gxi those bow prostrate
(Kaj proklam popol observ Hajj pilgrimage Ili ven vi marsx rajd various exhausted means transportation)! Ili ven farthest locations
Ili streb commercial benefits ili commemorate di nom specified tag por proviz them livestock! Mangx therefrom feed despondent poor
Ili komplet their obligations fulfill their vows vizit antikv shrine
Those reverence rites dekret DI ind bon rekompenc their Lord All livestock far lawful your food escept por those specifically prohibited vi. Vi evit abomen idol worship evit bor false witness
Vi argument your devotion absolutely DI sol. Anyone sets any idol DI est 1 who fal cxiel tiam gets snatched vultures blov vent profund ravine
Ja those reverence rites dekret DI demonstrate righteousness their kor
(livestock) proviz vi many benefits por a period, antaux donac antikv shrine
each congregation ni dekret rites whereby ili commemorate nom DI por proviz them livestock! Your di est 1 kaj des sam di; vi shall all submit Him. Don bon news al des obedient
Ili est unu kor trem upon menci DI ili steadfastly persevere adversity ili observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) el our provisions al them ili don charity

Best offerings est rites dekret DI your own bon Vi menci di nom them while ili star en lini. Once ili ofert ofer vi mangx therefrom feed poor needy This why ni subdued them vi ke vi montr your appreciation
Nek their viand nor their sang reaches DI. Ki reaches Him est your righteousness. Li subdued them vi vi montr vi appreciation glor DI por direkt vi! Don bon news al des charitable
DI DEFEND those KRED. DI NE AM any betrayer unappreciative
Permission granted those est persekut ekde injustice befallen them DI est certainly able al support them

Ili evicted their hejm unjustly por ne raci ali than dir Our Lord est DI. gxi ne est di supporting de kelk popol others monasteries eklezi synagogues masjids! - Kie nom DI commemorated frequently - Detru! Absolutely DI supports those support Him. DI est Powerful Almighty
Ili est those ni appointed them rulers ter ili establ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) obligatory charity (Zakat) advokat righteousness forbid evil DI est ultimate ruler
Se ili reject vi popol Noah ‘Aad Thamoud ankaux disbelieved them
Ankaux popol Abraham popol Lot
dwellers Midyan. Moses ankaux rejected Mi plumb all those popol tiam mi vok them kont kiel devastating est My requital
Many community ni annihilated their wickedness. Ili ended ruin ankoraux put great empty mansions
Ili ne roam ter tiam uz their mens Did kompren uz their orel auxd? Ja efektiv blindness ne est blindness okul blindness kor kest
Ili challenge vi bring retribution DI neniam fails fulfill His prophecy! Tag your Lord est 1000 de your jar
Many community en des preter committed evil mi plumb them sur awhile tiam mi pun them. Al Me est ultimate destiny
dir O popol mi est send al vi as profound warner
Those kred plumb righteous life ind forgiveness generous recompense
As por those strive challenge our revelations ili incur Infer
Ni ne send vi any messenger nor prophet hav diabl interfere his wishes DI TIAM nullifies KI DIABL done DI PERFEKT His revelations. DI est Omniscient SAGX
Li tiel sets diabl scheme test those haven dub their kor those kor hard. wicked dev ceter opposition
Those ben knowledge recognize truth your Lord tiam kred en gxi their kor readily akcept gxi! plej assuredly DI direkt believers dekstr path
As por those disbelieve ili ad haven dub Hor ven them suddenly retribution terrible tag ven them
All sovereignty ke tag aparten al DI Li jugx them. As por those kred plumb righteous life ili ind gxarden bliss
While those disbelieved rejected our revelations incurred shameful retribution
Those emigrate DI tiam get killed mort DI testament surely dusx them bon provisions DI est certainly PUT Provider
plej assuredly Li admit them admittance placx them. DI est Omniscient Clement
Gxi dekret 1 vengx injustice inflicted him equitably tiam li persekut this DI testament surely support him! DI est Pardoner Forgiving
est fakt DI merges nokt tag merges tag nokt kaj ti DI est Hearer Seer
est fakt DI est Truth while setting de any idols Him constitutes falsehood kaj ti DI est plej Alt Supreme
Vi ne seg DI send cxiel akv Do ke torn land verd? DI EST Sublime Cognizant
Al Him aparten cxio heavens cxio sur ter! Absolutely DI est plej Ricx Praiseworthy
Vi ne seg DI committed en Do your service cxio ter? Sxip kur ocean His ordon. Li prevent heavenly korp crashing ter en accordance kun His ordon. DI est Kind towards POPOL Merciful
Li est 1 who granted vi life tiam Li puts vi death tiam Li brings vi dors life! Surely human est est unappreciative
Por each congregation ni dekret set rites ili uphold. Do ili ne disput vi. Vi ad invit everyone your Lord plej assuredly vi est dekstr path
Ili argue vi tiam dir DI est fully aware da cxio vi do
DI testament JUGX among VI TAG Resurrection all your DISPUT
Vi ne realize ke DI kon cxio en heavens cxio sur ter? All this recorded record This est facil DI do
Ili idolize DI idols wherein Li ne ej potenc ili kon nothing them! transgressors ne hav helper

When our revelations recited them clearly vi recognize wickedness vizagx de those disbelieve. Ili preskaux atak those recite our revelations them. dir mi inform vi de io mult mav Infer promes DI those disbelieve; ki miserable destiny

O popol here est parable ke vi ponder carefully idols vi set DI neniam kre flug ecx ili band together do tial! Furthermore se flug sxtel anything el them ili ne recover gxi; weak est pursuer des pursued
Ili ne value DI as Li valued DI est PLEJ Powerful Almighty
DI chooses EL ANGXEL messengers ANKAUX as EL POPOL. DI est Hearer Seer
Li kon their preter their future Al DI aparten ultimate control all materi
O vi kred vi bow prostrate worship your Lord work righteousness ke vi sukces
Vi strive ig DI vi strive His ig. Li chosen vi ne ej hardship vi practicing your
